resources.string: Press the button to load the movie list
You are not connected to internet. Please connect and try again

Another interesting component introduced in Material Design is the Snackbar. Snackbars are just like Toast messages except they provide action to interact with. Snackbar will be displayed at the bottom of the screen and can be swiped off in order to dismiss them. Another interesting component introduced in Material Design is the Snackbar.
